name: METHYLCELLULOSE
doses:
Preparations that swell in contact
with liquid should always be carefully swallowed with water and should
not be taken immediately before going to bed

constipation and diarrhoea, 3–6 tablets twice daily; in
constipation the dose should be taken with at least 300 mL liquid;
in diarrhoea, ileostomy, and colostomy control, avoid liquid intake
for 30 minutes before and after dose; child 7–12 years see BNF for Children
